subject: Baseball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Evan Longoria and B. J. Upton had titanic home runs off Jon Lester as the Tampa Bay Rays crushed the Boston Red Sox in Game 3 of the A.L.C.S. at Fenway Park.
snippet: Evan Longoria and B. J. Upton had titanic home runs off Jon Lester as the Tampa Bay Rays crushed the Boston Red Sox in Game 3 of the A.L.C.S. at Fenway Park.
